name: Battle Crust
description: "Battle Crust" is a 80's-90's arcade-style shooter. You make full use of "Charge shot" that is available by obtaining the item, And let's Complete all of the 6 stage!
minimum_requirements: OS: windows10,8,7,vista,xp Processor: CPU 1.5GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 70 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows10,8,7,vista,xp Processor: CPU 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 800 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 70 MB available space
